description: Comoros previously establishing a curfew that started April 25th, from 8:00 p.m. to 5:00 a.m. throughout the national territory. Now this curfew has been relaxed and is now from 11:00pm till 5:00am. UPDATE: The initial curfew set on April 25th from 8:00pm to 5:00 am is now relaxed and became from 11:00pm till 5:00am.

description: Comoros suspended sea travel between islands from the 19th of March until further notice. This measure particularly affects travel on board the Kwassa-Kwassa, between the four islands.

description: Comoros suspended sea travel between islands from the 19th of March until further notice. The travel ban that was imposed between islands on March 18th has been lifted on July 8th, on condition that everyone above the age of 12 wears a mask when on a boat or at sea. UPDATE: The ban on all maritime travel that was set on March 18th until further notice, has been lifted on July 8th, with the condition that everyone above the age of 12 wears masks.
date_end_spec: The policy has a clear end date
target_geog_level: One or more countries, but not all countries

description: Comoros prohibited Friday and collective prayers in mosques from March 25th. All mosques throughout the country will remain closed until the health situation is resolved.

description:
Comoros prohibited Friday and collective prayers in mosques from March 25th. All mosques throughout the country will remain closed until the health situation is resolved.
As of July 8th, all mosques and other places of worship are reopened. The places of ablution (hand washing, cleansing) within religious buildings will remain closed. UPDATE: As of July 8th, Mosques and other places of worships are reopened. The places of ablution (hand washing, cleansing) within religious spaces will remain closed.
date_end_spec: The policy has a clear end date
